title: Social Event Discovery
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want personalized recommendations for social events based on my interests, so that I can stay connected with family and friends and feel less isolated.

title: Easy Video Call Initiation with Pre-Set Favorites
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to make video calls to my family and friends easily by selecting from pre-set favorites, so that I can stay connected without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Personalized Engagement Activities
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest hobbies and activities based on my interests, so that I can stay engaged and connected without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Family and Caregiver Connection – Emergency Alerts
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to send emergency alerts to my designated contacts so that I can feel safe and ensure that my family is informed in case of any urgent situation.

title: Facilitation of New Friendships through Common Interests
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest social activities and events based on my interests, like classical music and volunteering, so that I can connect with others and reduce my feelings of isolation.

title: User Feedback Loop for Social Features - Collection of User Preferences for Social Activities
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to provide feedback on my social activity preferences so that ALFRED can suggest events and activities that align with my interests and help me stay connected with my family and friends.

title: Cognitive Engagement Reminders – Daily Prompts for Social Interactions
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want daily reminders for social interactions so that I can stay connected with my family and friends and avoid feeling isolated.

title: Emergency Alert System
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want an immediate alert system for emergencies so that I can feel safe and secure at home, knowing help is just a command away.
